revised_title: The Identity of Professor Malet's Invariants and Sir James Cockle's Criticoids
tldr: This article demonstrates the absolute identity between Professor Malet's classes of invariants and Sir James Cockle's criticoids, showing that the two classes of functions coincide in every aspect. The author compares the researches of both mathematicians and presents the main findings in a connected form, highlighting the similarities and connections between their work.
